name: 1dplot
author: AFNI Developers
description: Graphs the columns of a *.1D time series file to the X11 screen, or to an image file (.jpg or .png).

inputs.name: Time Series Files
inputs.description: Input time series files (*.1D) to be plotted.
Install a new X11 colormap.
inputs.name: Install Colormap

inputs.description: Plot each column in a separate sub-graph.
inputs.name: Separate Sub-Graphs

inputs.description: Plot all columns together in one big graph.
inputs.name: One Big Graph

inputs.description: Plot each column in a separate sub-graph and allow each sub-graph to have a different y-scale. This option is meaningless with -one!
inputs.name: Separate Sub-Graphs with different y-scale

inputs.description: Don't plot the connecting lines.
inputs.name: No Connecting Lines

inputs.description: Same as -noline, but will not try to plot values outside the rectangular box that contains the graph axes.
inputs.name: No Connecting Lines with Axis Containment

inputs.description: Plot a small 'box' at each data point.
inputs.name: Plot Boxes

inputs.description: Plot graphs in histogram style (i.e., vertical boxes).
inputs.name: Histogram Style

inputs.description: Independently scale each time series plotted to have L_2 norm = 1 (sum of squares).
inputs.name: L2 Norm Scaling

inputs.description: Independently scale each time series plotted to have max absolute value = 1 (L_infinity norm).
inputs.name: Linfinity Norm Scaling

inputs.description: Independently scale each time series plotted to have max sum of absolute values = 1 (L_1 norm).
inputs.name: L1 Norm Scaling

inputs.description: Remove the mean from each time series before normalizing.
inputs.name: Demean Time Series

inputs.description: Use for X axis the data in a specified .1D file.
inputs.name: X axis data

inputs.description: Use log10 of the specified .1D file as the X axis.
inputs.name: Log10 X axis data

inputs.description: Spacing between points on the x-axis.
inputs.name: X-axis spacing

inputs.description: Initial x coordinate.
inputs.name: Initial X coordinate

inputs.description: Don't 'push' axes ranges outwards.
inputs.name: No Axis Pushing

inputs.description: Skip first 'nn' rows in the input file.
inputs.name: Ignore Initial Rows

inputs.description: Plot 'mm' points.
inputs.name: Use Specified Points

inputs.description: Put string 'aa' below the x-axis.
inputs.name: X-axis Label

inputs.description: Put string 'aa' to the left of the y-axis.
inputs.name: Y-axis Label

inputs.description: Put string 'pp' atop the plot.
inputs.name: Plot Label

inputs.description: Same as -plabel, but only works with -ps/-png/-jpg/-pnm options.
inputs.name: Plot Title

inputs.description: Set string 'pp' as the title of the frame containing the plot.
inputs.name: Window Title

inputs.description: Do NOT plot axes or labels, just the graph(s).
inputs.name: Naked Graph

inputs.description: Set the width-to-height ratio of the plot region to 'A'.
inputs.name: Aspect Ratio

inputs.description: Don't read from tsfile; instead, read from stdin and plot it.
inputs.name: Read from Stdin

inputs.description: Don't draw plot in a window; instead, write it to stdout in PostScript format.
inputs.name: PostScript Output

inputs.description: Render plot to JPEG image and save to a file named 'fname'.
inputs.name: JPEG Output

inputs.description: Render plot to JPEG image and save to a file named 'fname'.
inputs.name: JPEG Output

inputs.description: Render plot to PNG image and save to a file named 'fname'.
inputs.name: PNG Output

inputs.description: Render plot to PNM image and save to a file named 'fname'.
inputs.name: PNM Output

inputs.description: Render plot to PNG image of specified size and save to a file named 'fname'.
inputs.name: PNG Output with Size

inputs.description: Render plot to JPEG image of specified size and save to a file named 'fname'.
inputs.name: JPEG Output with Size

inputs.description: Render plot to JPEG image of specified size and save to a file named 'fname'.
inputs.name: JPEG Output with Size

inputs.description: Render plot to PNM image of specified size and save to a file named 'fname'.
inputs.name: PNM Output with Size

inputs.description: Transform the data along the y-axis by applying the expression to each input value.
inputs.name: Y-axis Transformation

inputs.description: Transform the data along the x-axis by applying the expression to each input value.
inputs.name: X-axis Transformation

inputs.description: Set the x-axis to run from value 'b' to value 't', with 'n' major divisions and 'm' minor tic marks per major division.
inputs.name: X-axis Settings

inputs.description: Set the y-axis to run from value 'b' to value 't', with 'n' major divisions and 'm' minor tic marks per major division.
inputs.name: Y-axis Settings

inputs.description: Use the strings as labels to the right of the graphs, corresponding to each input column.
inputs.name: Y-axis Names

inputs.description: Makes the 'ynames' be the same as the 6 labels used in plug_volreg for Roll, Pitch, Yaw, I-S, R-L, and A-P movements.
inputs.name: Volume Registration Names

inputs.description: Increase the line thickness used for plotting.
inputs.name: Increase Line Thickness

inputs.description: Twice the power of '-thick' at no extra cost!
inputs.name: Double Line Thickness

inputs.description: Plot dashed lines between data points using specified colon-separated list of dash values (1: solid, 2: longer dashes, 3: shorter dashes).
inputs.name: Dashed Lines

inputs.description: Set environment variable 'name' to 'val' for this run of the program only.
inputs.name: Set Environment Variable

inputs.description: Set the color used for marking to a specified color.
inputs.name: Censor Marking Color

inputs.description: Specify the filename of the censor .1D time series.
inputs.name: Censor Time Series

inputs.description: Specify time indexes to be marked in the graph(s).
inputs.name: Censor Time Indexes

inputs.description: Specify the filename for the list of concatenated runs.
inputs.name: Concatenated Runs

inputs.description: Draw a rectangular box with specified corners and colors.
inputs.name: Draw Rectangular Box

inputs.description: Draw a rectangular box with one extra horizontal line.
inputs.name: Draw Rectangular Box with Line

inputs.description: Draw one line segment.
inputs.name: Draw Line Segment
